name: San Juan Plaza Hotel

reviews.text: My family and I stayed at this hotel the night before our cruise on the Carnival Destiny. We used Holiday Inn rewards points for our stay. The hotel is close to a beach, but much of the beach area is a rocky shore. The taxi ride from the airport to the hotel was $19.50 and the taxi ride to the airport with 6 large bags was $25. The taxi to Old San Juan was $12. Don't miss the forts!
reviews.title: Nice Hotel, Good Location

likes.liked: — Nice location, close to beach and restaurants

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was nice and clean. The only downside to this hotel was that checking in and out was unbelievably slow! The computers w/ internet free of use was nice and the small pool and hot tub were not crowded. Continental breakfast was good, just like any holiday inn express, except no cinnamon rolls. Having a Walgreen's 3 blocks away was nice and there were some good restaurants in that same area. Overall a good place to stay.
reviews.title: Good for the price- for one night

likes.liked: — cleanliness, price, near the airport and port

reviews.title: Wouldn't stay here again unless absolutely necessary.
reviews.text: We stayed at the Holiday Inn Express,Condado Beach area for one night post cruise in March. The staff was friendly. The rooms were nice. We had a corner room with a desk. It was clean and adequate in size. The beds were great for sleeping. We were on the top floor so, noise was not a problem.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The pool was very small but clean and private. There was a nice little beach about a half of a block away. It was a small city park beach but, we enjoyed it. The area was safe.
reviews.title: Great for a one night stay!!

likes.liked: — Cleanliness of room, good hotel restaurants, helpful staff, close to beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The free continental breakfast consisted of cold cereals, bagels, toast, juice and coffee. There was internet access but, no printer.
reviews.title: Good value for the money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Holiday Inn Express in the Condado area of San Juan is a clean, comfortable, quiet hotel. A continental breakfast is served, but there is no restaurant. I would recommend this hotel for a one-night stay, but not more than that.
reviews.title: clean with no frills
Hotel
reviews.text: We just returned from a trip to Puerto Rico where we spent 10 days at the Holiday Inn Express Condado. It was a very efficient hotel and was probably the cleanest small hotel I have ever stayed in. The rooms were immaculate and the maids were always cleaning. Computers were available for emailing home and there was almost never a wait. Swimming pool was small but nice. The only negative is that they have almost no parking room. This, however, seems to be typical all over Puerto Rico.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room was plenty large enough and had ceramic tile floors.
reviews.title: great hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Mr & Mrs M Warwickshire UK
reviews.title: we had a very pleasant stay

likes.liked: — Tke location,the nice room, the breakfast bar and of course the service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in the hotel for one night pre-cruise and it was ideally located close enough to the airport after a long flight from the uk but also close enough to the cruise terminal not to have to spend too much time in a taxi. The local area is great lots of bars and resturants and a beautiful beach within walking distance. I would advise you to book a queensize twin room if you like space. The staff were friendly and the buffet breakfast was well worth getting out of the comfortable bed for. The pool was a good size and nicely enclosed for hotel guests only. If I was to cruise from San Juan again I would definately stay at this hotel.
reviews.title: A Well Run Holiday Inn Express

reviews.text: Stayed one Saturday night prior to a cruise and the hotel was clean and the staff friendly. As the cruise didn't depart until Sunday evening they allowed us to store our bags there while we explored Old San Juan. There was a nice beach less than a block away however we walked to El Morro fortress at the far end of Old San Juan and caught a cab back (about a 3 mile walk and definitely worth it). Old San Juan is mostly closed on Sundays so we will return in the future and spend more time there.
reviews.title: Great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2005, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for a pre-cruise for 2 days. It's a nice little hotel if you are on a budget & don't want to spend $$$ on the bigger ones.
reviews.title: Awesome Hotel!! Recommend for Budgeted people

likes.disliked: — Ask to be put on the high floors for the views!

reviews.text: We had a corner room that faced the lagoon. It wasn't big, but fine for what we needed. The pool is small, its just behind the little eating area for continental breakfast.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel for short stay

likes.liked: — Location close to sightseeing old San Juan
likes.disliked: — Lots of construction near, some hotels rundown and closed

reviews.title: HI Express is just fine.......
reviews.text: There was some construction going on while we were there. Don't know what they were building, but it was noisy. It' didn't bother me! I grew up in NYC! Home of noise!

reviews.title: Needs improvement
reviews.text: Staff is very, very efficient & very helpful. They helped me book a cave/arrecibo trip through them. We were picked up at the hotel for this excursion. See my photo's.

It is not the most luxurious, it does not have the most amenities and the locale has it's issues. However, the staff was amazingly pleasant and helpful, cheerful and downright fun! I had a blast chatting with Maggie at the tours desk and I believe her name to be either Iris or Aida (memory falters) at the front desk.
reviews.title: Warm and Friendly Staff

likes.liked: — friendly staff, central location, good rates
likes.disliked: — Parking! Computer access not so hot

reviews.text: They just loved the fact that I get lost everywhere and made all kinds of strip maps for me to get places (altho I managed to oblige and get lost anyway...they loved it).
reviews.title: Comfortable Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The cleaning staff was excellent, always leaving the room impeccable and they were quite friendly when you engage them in conversation. Tipping always helps with service and here was no exception.
reviews.title: Convienent, Safe Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Continental breakfast was much better than I expected and my little boy loved having his hard boiled egg almost daily...blech..lol.. The staff there kept that area immaculate. There was always a local paper to read, either in spanish or english.
reviews.title: Would Stay Here Again!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I was too busy to use the pool, being rather high strung, pools don't always relax me, but the families using it seemed to have a good time.
reviews.title: Great, Great, Great Hotel

aka: Holiday Inn Express San Juan Hotel San Juan
description: San Juan Plaza Hotel features an excellent location in the exclusive Condado area. Its beauty and splendor overlook Condado Lagoon. Within walking distance, you will enjoy first class shopping, with all major jewelery stores, souvenirs and fashion designer boutiques at hand. Visit the beautiful Condado Beach within walking distance to the hotel. And when the night falls, casinos and exciting nightlife are the name of the game. Take advantage of our free deluxe continental breakfast, 24 hour complimentary coffee & tea in lobby, outdoor pool, fitness room or business centre. San Juan Plaza Hotel offers great value. With highly trained and qualified personnel which guarantees all necessary arrangements for groups, conventions, social activities and business meetings.
